title: Cloudant will provide an exported copy of your data in the event of termination

tosdr.case: they provide a way to export your data
tosdr.tldr: In the event of termination, and upon a written request which can be in the form of an email, Cloudant will provide you with a copy of your data in an open format. However, Subscribers are liable for any bandwidth costs associated with the archiving/exporting process.
